Package de.tudarmstadt.ukp.clarin.webanno.project.page

Provides wicket components for project configurations (create project, add document/user/tagset....)

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnnotationGuideLinePanel
    A Panel used to add Project Guidelines in a selected Project
    HelpDataModel
    A class consisting of property field to store help contents for different buttons in ProjectPage
    HelpModalWindowPanel
    A panel that is used to display a TextField or Label to add/display help contents
    ImportUtil
    This class contains Utility methods that can be used in Project settings
    ProjectDocumentsPanel
    A Panel used to add Documents to the selected Project
    ProjectExportPanel
    A Panel used to add Project Guidelines in a selected Project
    ProjectExportPanel.ProjectExportModel  
    ProjectLayersPanel
    A Panel Used to add Layers to a selected Project in the project settings page
    ProjectPage
    This is the main page for Project Settings.
    ProjectPage.SelectionModel  
    ProjectTagSetsPanel
    A Panel user to manage Tagsets.
    ProjectUsersPanel
    A Panel used to add user permissions to a selected Project
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ProjectExportException
    Exception thrown while exporting the whole project
    ZippingException
    Throw an exception if the a span annotation is not in the same sentence * @author Seid Muhie Yimam
